titleStmt.title: The history or narrative of the great level of the fenns, called Bedford level with a large map of the said level, as drained, surveyed, & described by Sir Jonas Moore Knight, His late Majesties Surveyor-General of his ordnance.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Jonas, Sir, 1617-1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
